title: Government denies weakening Online Safety Bill
description: New law will not require removal of "legal but harmful" content, which critics said risked free speech.

title: Meta fined €265m by Irish data watchdog over breach
description: The Irish Data Protection Commission says its inquiry has found Meta breached GDPR rules.

title: The birth pangs of the Grand Theft Auto franchise
description: On its 25th anniversary, an early GTA producer reveals the trials faced by its original developers.
